Class CourseService

java.lang.Object
com.panotify.service.CourseService
public class CourseService extends Object
Service class for managing course-related operations. Provides functionality for creating courses, managing enrollments, and tracking student progress. This class interacts with the database to perform CRUD operations on course data.

    • createCourse

      public boolean createCourse(Course course) throws SQLException
      Creates a new course in the system.
      Parameters:
      course - The Course object containing course details
      Returns:
      true if course creation successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • getCoursesByInstructor

      public List<Course> getCoursesByInstructor(int instructorId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves all courses taught by a specific instructor.
      Parameters:
      instructorId - The ID of the instructor
      Returns:
      List of Course objects associated with the instructor
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • getCoursesByStudent

      public List<Course> getCoursesByStudent(int studentId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves all courses in which a student is enrolled. Also includes the instructor's name for each course.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student
      Returns:
      List of Course objects the student is enrolled in
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • enrollStudent

      public boolean enrollStudent(int userId, String courseCode) throws SQLException
      Enrolls a student in a course using the course code.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the student to enroll
      courseCode - The unique code of the course
      Returns:
      true if enrollment successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • getCourseByCode

      public Course getCourseByCode(String courseCode) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a course by its unique code.
      Parameters:
      courseCode - The unique code of the course
      Returns:
      Course object if found, null otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • getStudentProgress

      public List<StudentProgress> getStudentProgress(int courseId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves progress information for all students in a course. Includes number of exams taken, total exams, and average scores.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course
      Returns:
      List of StudentProgress objects containing progress information
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • getEnrolledStudentCount

      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course
      Returns:
      Number of enrolled students
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs
